protein.specific_function: Interacts with the components of the replication complex and 2 kinases, CDK2 and CDC7, thereby providing a functional and physical link between CDK2 and CDC7 during firing of the origins of replication. Regulates ATR-mediated checkpoint signaling

reference.reference_text: Grishina I, Lattes B: A novel Cdk2 interactor is phosphorylated by Cdc7 and associates with components of the replication complexes. Cell Cycle. 2005 Aug;4(8):1120-6. Epub 2005 Aug 10.
